A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a film which was to quote a friend 'less than the sum of it's parts'. Everything is here but it's messy\, ill thought out and more riddled with holes than a Swiss cheese. It has a progressive political agenda that is in equal parts patronising and dull. It plays havoc with the original trilogies legacy and may even be worse then some of the prequels\, especially the revenge of the Sith which at least had a coherent narrative. The disparity between the critics view and the fans shows how ludicrously out of touch the critics are\, and how little they seem to understand the excellence of the original trilogy.
